blurb: A simple Hello World application can look like this, strict, warnings, utf8 and Perl 5.10 features are automatically enabled and a few functions imported when you use Mojolicious::Lite, turning your script into a full featured web application.
subtitle: Hello World
html: A simple Hello World application can look like this, strict, warnings, utf8 and Perl 5.10 features are automatically enabled and a few functions imported when you use Mojolicious::Lite, turning your script into a full featured web application.
